title: [机械|娱乐][汉化]Project HungerGames —— 又一个饥饿游戏插件[1.7.2-1.7.9]
author: wedfwsd
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:22 编辑 

更新：[机械|娱乐]Project HungerGames v0.6 —— 又一个饥饿游戏插件(永久更新)[1.7.2] http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-260030-1-1.html


Project HungerGames
这是继“Survival Games”之后的另外一个饥饿游戏，由于原帖作者放弃更新（说好的永久更新呢！）所以我来搬运新的版本。
特点：
·有很多可以配置的内容 ·可以看胜利者名单 ·你可以自己加入地图或者让插件帮你生成 ·一个大厅 ·生成随机的物品（可配置的，你可以选择有什么物品生成在箱子里！） ·广播随机信息（也是可以配置的！） ·等级栏倒计时 ·工具包系统 ·容易使用的API ·支持蹦极（跨服链接） ·奖励系统 ·自动升级 ·旁观者模式 ·（作者的话：以及是我制作的！）
命令以及权限：
 命令 权限 效果/hg joinhungergames.join 加入当前游戏/hg leavehungergames.leave 退出当前游戏/hg infoshungergames.infos 看当前游戏的信息/hg winners <页码>hungergames.winners 查看胜利者/hg kit create <名字>hungergames.kits.create 创建工具包/hg kit delete <名字>hungergames.kits.delete 删除工具包/hg setlobbyhungergames.lobby.set 设置大厅讲一下随机生成物品：格式：{"amount":null,"chances":20,"material":"EMERALD","lore":["§oI know you love it too."],"name":"§aEmerald","enchantments":null}
第一个数量，第二个几率 第三个材质 第四个描述 第五个名字 第六个附魔 第一个写null代表就一个 附魔写NULL代表没有 名字写NULL代表使用材质的名字经测试不兼容更多附魔，要自己写入LORE！
更新日志：
Change log Feel free to leave some feedback here, to contribute here and to donate here.  Note : Project HungerGames is in Beta. You can post a ticket here with a detailled walkthrough (used to reproduce the error).  Beta v0.9.2  The previous file was broken. Beta v0.9.1  Updated Skyoconfig and Skyupdater. Updated EffectLib dependency. Beta v0.9  New configuration system ! The plugin stores its Json entities into a directory called "config-data", you will see, you will love this new system :D Fixed problems with commands (and sub-commands). Some optimizations and improvements. Beta v0.8  Added blood. Added an option which makes the compass locates the nearest player. EffectLib hook added. When a player dies, his name appears in the sky. A lot of bugs fixes. Beta v0.7.3  Another update of Skyoconfig. New fast command engine. New performance improvements. Fixed some bugs. Beta v0.7.2  Updated Skyoconfig (less config bugs, better performances). Beta v0.7.1  Critical config bugs fixed. Beta v0.7  Individuals permissions for kits. Added command /hg lobby used to set the lobby at your location. Mob bar countdown is now available. Updated the BungeeCord add-on. Fixed bugs. Beta v0.6  An option to use the server as a dedicated server (not need to type /hg join or /hg leave anymore) ! BungeeCord supports (you will need a third party plugin, I will upload it soon) ! Some bugs fixes. Beta v0.5.7  You can specify the amount in Json Items ! Rewards added ! Added some messages. Some bugs fixed. Beta v0.5.6  Fixed bugs and restrictions with kits. Fixed JAR size. Beta v0.5.5  Added kits (with commands and permissions). Fixed bugs and improved some things. Beta v0.5.4  Items are now in Json format (added probabilities too). Error logs improved. Fixed bugs (thanks error logs) ! Beta v0.5.3  Error reports are improved. Beta v0.5.2  You can now log messages into a directory. Improved auto bug report. Bugs fixes. Beta v0.5.1  Bugs fixes for the invisible border. Others bugs fixed. Beta v0.5  Added config options for the current map (you can choose gamerules and the default time now). Added an auto bug report. When the plugin has an exception, it will send me a message (configurable). Multiverse compatibilty added ! If you have Multiverse-Core on your server, the plugin will automatically detects it and process maps with it (creating, unloading, deleting, ...). Improved borders creation. Improved the invisible border. Code cleaned up ! Changed the description. Fixed some bugs. Beta v0.4  Added an option to protect your lobby from griefing. Turn it off if you want to edit your lobby ! Bugs fixes. Skyupdater updates. Beta v0.3  Allows you to define the spawn of your lobby. Added an easy to use API. You can define a border of differents types (but you must have WorldEdit installed if you want a physical border) ! You can activate the AutoSneak feature (your players will always be sneaking which allows you to hide their names). Players can now join the current game (but they will be added as spectators). Code cleaned up ! Some changes in MetricsLite. Beta v0.2  Some configuration updates. Logging improved. Beta v0.1  First public Beta.


不做伸手党！
